#summary What do I need to use sprout.

There are 3 things your hosting has to provide for you to be able to use sprout:

  # Java (1.4 or 1.5)
  # MySQL (any version)
  # Apache (preferrably 2)

The only tricky part is that you need to [http://code.google.com/p/rupy/wiki/VirtualHostProxy VirtualHostProxy] your domain in Apache, simply ask if your host can enter the following into the apache config:
{{{
NameVirtualHost *:80
<VirtualHost *:80>
    ServerName yourdomain.com
    ServerAlias www.yourdomain.com
    ProxyPass / http://localhost:9000/
    ProxyPassReverse / http://localhost:9000/
</VirtualHost>
}}}
